name: Clean up Time!
description:
- Holy Crap... What a mess...

- Hey you!

- It's clean up time!

- Quickly!

- Or I'll fire you!

Clean up this mess... to not to be fired and make this place cleaner!

Compete with Your Friends to be the best cleaner in cleaners hall of fame!

Game was created during Hackathon WSIiZ in December 2021, then after adding little bit of corrections and addons finished and uploaded on itch.io in February 2022.
